contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of October, 2014, the Petition for Review and the Application for Emergency Relief are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation improper). The Prothonotary is DIRECTED to forward the filings to counsel of record and strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
